DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of propofol, etomidate and propofol-etomidate combination on hemodynamic responses during laryngoscopy and tracheal intubation and assess the adverse effect related to this drugs.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Etomidate, Propofol and Etomidate-propofol Combination in Terms of Effects on Haemodynamic Response to Intubation
DOC.criteria: between 18 65 age ASA I II status elective surgery emergency surgery pregnancy alcohol and drug abuse HT and cardiovascular disease BMI > 25 kg/m2 hypersensitivity against study drug sedative drug use in last month difficult intubation
